name: Pipe
desc: A small pipe that can be used.
effect: You may use this item to relax using _Herbal Remedy_ or other similar items.

name: Sketchbook
desc: A small, many-page book for sketching in, coupled with a simple charcoal pencil.

name: Herbal Remedy
desc: Herbs that, when smoked, allow you to relax and unwind.

name: Health Flask
desc: A potion that fills you with energy and staunches minor wounds.
effect: If used as _Medicine_, the target may mark an additional segment on their _Wound_ clock.

abilities.name: Drink
abilities.effect: Create an [_Opening_]. Clear all _Stun_, then restore 5 _Stamina_. If you are _Bleeding_, reduce the value by 5.

name: Caltrops
desc: A satchel full of small triangle spikes of metal that can be scattered to deny an area to foes.
effect: A small bag of metallic caltrops that can be used to deter enemies from entering a space. These are typically lost after use, but characters that have a way to quickly collect them may be able to reuse them. If used as a _Missile_, use _Scatter_ at no cost in the target's _Arena_. While _Worn_, this may be treated as an effectively unlimited source for _Trinket_ _Metal_ items.

abilities.name: Scatter
abilities.effect: You scatter metallic caltrops in the Target, creating dangerous terrain that makes the _Arena_ _Rough_. A creature may take 2 [_Stab_] Damage to ignore this effect for a single Move or _Negate_.

name: Seed Bomb
desc: A collection of seeds wrapped around a core of powerful wood spiritual energy, allowing one to immediately cover an area in verdant green.
effect: When imbued with a trace amount of spiritual energy this will violently detonate a short time after, spreading a huge growth of green across the area, regardless of how barren it was before. The plants persist, but after a few hours the magic sustaining their growth fades, causing them to act as normal plants would.

abilities.name: Spread Green
abilities.effect: The target _Arena_ becomes covered in resilient plantlife and gains [_Fertile_].

name: Thunderstone
desc: A fragile crystal that, when shattered, emits a vicious blast of light and sound.
effect: This stone, when hit with sufficient force, detonates in a concussive blast of light and sound that can destroy objects or act as a signal.

abilities.name: Fling
abilities.effect:
All creatures in an _Engagement_ within Range must immediately _Negate_ [8 _Grit_].
* On a success, they are _Grazed_.
* On a failure, they are _Hit_.

name: Smith's Tools
effect: A set of simple metal-working tools that can be used to repair Metal equipment while traveling, or handle simple forging if you have access to a forge. It includes a hammer, tongs, and various files.
desc: Portable smithing supplies that are excellent for field repairs of equipment.

name: Herbalist's Tools
effect: A set of simple herbalism tools that can be used to prepare herbs. It includes a mortar and pestle, a few basic alchemical reagents, and tools for harvesting and preserving herbs.
desc: Portable herbalism tools that can be used to create basic remedies and tonics.

name: Wine
desc: While it's hardly the finest vintage, this fortified wine is excellent for taking the edge off after a hard day of traveling.
effect: You may consume this while resting to automatically clear a _Stress_, but cannot remove the <u>Crash</u> Danger from their Rest Roll if you do so.

name: Polish Kit
desc: Various rags and oils for keeping metal sparkling and pristine.
effect: Metal Spirits enjoy being Pampered with this item.

name: Bedroll
desc: A simple bedroll and bedding material that keeps you off the ground and ensures a good nights sleep.

name: Tent
desc: A tent big enough for two that keeps you out of the weather to ensure a good nights sleep.

name: Antidote
effect: This may be used as if it was _Medicine_ for a non-Spirit character suffering from a _Poison_ _Wound_; if it is, the character may mark an additional two segments on the Clock.

abilities.name: Drink
abilities.reqs: May not be used by Spirits.
abilities.effect: Create an [_Opening_]. Reduce your _Poisoned_ value by 4.

name: Rope
desc: 15 meters of rope. There is absolutely no use for rope on adventures, it has yet to be found.

name: Rations
desc: Dried food such as tough jerky and hardtack that, while an unpleasant meal, is enough to keep you moving.

name: Iron Scrap
desc: Assorted random bits of scrap metal, typically used for extensive equipment repair.
effect: While _Worn_, this may be treated as an effectively unlimited source for _Load_ 0 _Metal_ items.

name: Waterskin
desc: A water-tight pouch containing a day's worth of water.
effect: This carries a day's worth of water, and can be treated as 1 _Load_ of water for Abilities.

name: Medicinal Herbs
desc: A cluster of common medicinal herbs with a variety of healing properties.
effect: This may be Refined into a _Poultice_ or _Healing Essence_. Additionally, as a _Camp Action_, any character may attempt to create a _Poultice_ from this. Roll a d6; on a 4 or higher, create a _Poultice_. On a failure, the herbs are lost. If they have _Herbalist's Tools_ or similar, they instead always succeed.

name: Healing Essence
desc: Refined spiritual essence that lacks a distinct elemental affinity, tends to have a potent healing effect on living creatures. It is unsafe to use in this state.

name: Wood Essence
desc: Refined spiritual essence that channels the concentrated power of wood spirits. It is unsafe to use in this state.
